author.name: Ember Cross
author.biography: Firefighter-turned-author living in Phoenix, writing action-packed romances inspired by her former career.

summary.under120: When a debt-ridden chef meets the enigmatic heir to a Triad empire, their partnership ignites into something far more dangerous than either anticipated. Mei-Lin Fong fights to save her failing Chinatown restaurant while Jason Tang seeks to legitimize his family's blood-soaked legacy—but their collision unleashes a hunger that transforms both predator and prey. As violence erupts around them and enemies close in, Mei-Lin discovers that surrendering to the dragon's fire might be the only way to forge something unbreakable from the ashes of their old lives.
summary.under240: When Mei-Lin Fong's failing Chinatown restaurant becomes the target of a hostile takeover, she finds herself in an unlikely partnership with Jason Tang—the enigmatic heir to a criminal empire who's determined to legitimize his family's blood money. What begins as a desperate business arrangement ignites into something far more dangerous when Mei-Lin discovers that Jason's dark magnetism and ruthless protection awaken a hunger in her that matches his own violent devotion. But when Jason's enemies strike at the heart of everything Mei-Lin holds dear, she must choose between the safety of shadows and standing beside the dragon in his war—even if it means embracing the monster within herself. A scorching tale of power, possession, and the intoxicating surrender that comes when two damaged souls find their perfect match in each other's darkness.
summary.logLine: To rescue her failing restaurant, a desperate chef allies with a lethal Dragon Head, but their blistering connection triggers a brutal turf war where passion cuts as deep as knives—and love becomes the deadliest gamble.
